articles.description: Jose Gimenez could be banned for 15 matches after he appeared to elbow a FIFA official in the back of the head during his post-match meltdown following Uruguay's controversial World Cup exit
articles.content:
Uruguay defender Jose Gimenez could be slapped with a staggering 15-game ban after he appeared to elbow a FIFA official in the wake of his nation's controversial exit from the World Cup.
